content: WASHINGTON, May 8 (Reuters) - The White House said President Joe Biden's meeting with top congressional leaders to discuss the U.S. debt ceiling issue on Tuesday is scheduled for 4 p.m. ET at the Oval Office.

Reporters will have access to the start of the meeting, press secretary Karine-Jean Pierre said.Biden and Republicans and Democrats from Congress are set to sit down this week to avoid a crippling default before the end of May.(Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt in Washington, Editing by Franklin Paul)
